description.value: Your words and actions can stir the cruelest ambitions lurking in the hearts of your fellow incorrigibles. Whenever you Commit to the Bit, any creatures hit by the assisted creature's weapon attacks before the end of its next turn gains the @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.R54LQEKSDXNQ3N75]{Bleeding} condition.

system.requirements: Must have the Bard Starter Abilities
